response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. We understand its worth to you is $10,000, and we aim to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
